issue.title: How to run gazebo integrated unit test

content.raw: Yeah we can do that. Since i'm working with a decent sized group of people and we have tight control over our configurations it's more a question of which version do we force all of the developers to use and make sure it's installed in an automated fashion for everybody, so updating to Gazebo8 isn't a problem logistically. We just generally try to stick with an LTS. I do see a new LTS comes out in January, so we could just update to Gazbeo8 for now and hop on the new LTS in January.
